name: Pick-Pick Jump
description:
Introduction

Pick-Pick Jump is a videogame made with Unity for Android. It's as been based on the popular videogame named Helix Jump but it has some different aspects.

Goal

The goal of the game is to travel from start to finish line, avoiding the helix platorms of the helix structure, especially the death zones, in order to get points and reach the maximun the maximum score of the game.

Tools

In order to develop this game, the software tools used are the following ones:

  • Unity Hub 2.4.2.
  • Unity 3D (version 2019.4.17f1.
  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2019.
  • Sprites, animations, sounds and backgrounds (specified in credits section).
Support the game

This game has a story so much powerful to finsih it at this point. More versions will be released in the future in which some problems like the splat drawing will be fixed. Apart from that, more levels will be added with different kind of traps and enemies.  Feel totally free to give me some advices or ideas about what I have to improve to get a better user experience.

Source code

In the following link you can have a look to the source code of the project:

https://github.com/ZgzInfinity/PickPickJump
